abstract: Stocks were narrowly mixed in light trading on Tuesday as a surprise drop in construction and a cautious outlook from the retailer Home Depot led energy and utility stocks to pare gains.
snippet: Stocks were narrowly mixed in light trading on Tuesday as a surprise drop in construction and a cautious outlook from the retailer Home Depot led energy and utility stocks to pare gains.
